title: Fury 2014 DVDR R4 NTSC
description:
April 1945. As the Allies make their final foray into the war in Europe, a sergeant of the army hardened by war called Wardaddy (Brad Pitt) is responsible for the command of a Sherman tank and a team with five men on a deadly mission behind the lines enemy. Outnumbered, lightly armed, and dealing with a novice soldier in his squad, Wardaddy and his men face numerous adversities in their heroic attempts to strike at the heart of Nazi Germany.
